title: Open Source Revenue Generation: Models and Strategies
description: Learn about open source revenue generation methods, including support services, freemium models, SaaS, donations, dual licensing, and more. Discover how open source projects balance free access with financial sustainability.
keywords: Open Source Revenue Generation, open source business models, how open source makes money, freemium open source, SaaS, open core, donations, dual licensing, support services, open source monetization
